hadiths.text: It was narrated from Bilal bin Rabah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said to him, on the morning of Jama’:“O Bilal, calm the people down,” or “make them be quiet.” Then he said: “Allah has been very gracious to you in this Jam’ of yours. He has forgiven the wrongdoers among you because of the righteous among you, and He has given the righteous among you whatever they ask. Move on in the Name of Allah.”
